sentences.en: Although he pretended to sympathize, he was laughing in his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 虽然他假装同情, 但他却在暗笑.

sentences.en: Don't always rely on others to understand and sympathize.
sentences.cn: 不要老是指望别人的理解和同情.

sentences.en: He would sympathize but he wouldn't understand.
sentences.cn: 他可能会表示同情，但不会理解。

sentences.en: I don't tend to sympathize with those family heads who are oversensitive.
sentences.cn: 我对那些神经过敏的家伙并不同情.

sentences.en: I find it very hard to sympathize with him.
I must tell you how much I sympathize with you for your loss, Professor.
sentences.cn: 教授，我对您遭受的损失深表同情。

sentences.en: I sympathize with you in your bereavement.
sentences.cn: 我对你痛失亲人表示同情.

sentences.en: I sympathize, but I don’t know how to help.
sentences.cn: 我很同情，但不知道如何帮忙。

sentences.en: Just the same , as compared with other men, I sympathize with you.
sentences.cn: 可是, 同别人比较起来, 我还是同情你的.
听我说, 亲爱的, 我们深表同情.

sentences.en: Those who have the same illness sympathize with each other.
Tom's parents do not sympathize with his ambition to become an actor.
sentences.cn: 汤姆的母亲不赞同他当演员的志愿.

sentences.en: While I sympathize your point of view I cannot accept it.
sentences.cn: 虽然我同情你的观点,但我不能接受它.

悲怜地，怜悯地；富有同情心地
交感神经；容易感受的人
同情者；支持者；交感患病的眼睛（等于sympathiser）
钦佩,尊敬,鼓励,赞扬,同意

trans.tran_en: to feel sorry for someone because you understand their problems
